item.description: Come celebrate and dance the night away with me!! You only turn 40 once!!! It has been a good year so far and would love all my friends to come celebrate with me! Dinner and apps are available if you choose to do so. There will be a dj playing all of our favorite songs! Requests can be posted on here and I can relay that to the dj as I know him personally!! Hope to see you there!!!

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Tracy's 40th Birthday Celebration!!!! DRESS TO IMPRESS!!
